description:
"Peoplelog"--a social media service that uses AI to analyze the incredible amount of data on the internet, allowing you to learn all about a person. Enzo, the president of Shake Hands, introduces his ambitious new service to the public, and soon it becomes a disruptive force in the world. Lupin is in Vienna to rob an art museum, but is spotted by Peoplelog. He tries to escape, but Peoplelog predicts his every attempt...
Source: crunchyroll
